attributes.action: Abolish the loophole which allows people to avoid paying speeing fines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, if someone is caught speeding, and receives notification of it more than 2 weeks after the offence, they can get off paying the fine.  This should not be allowed - the fine should stand however long it takes.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
